title: IMF and Keen

title: Re: IMF and Keen
content:
1) The only way I know is to use WinAmp with Adplug (or whatever it's called). Of course, I haven't used it in a while (I started having problems with the plugin, and I rarely used it).

2) I don't think its possible yet (Well, possible, but not that easy to do. I think Shadow Master was gonna add a music/sound feature to EModKeen, but I'm not sure...-Genius314
[url=http://planetck.spatang.com]PlanetCK[/url]

title: Re: IMF and Keen
content: You mean the reason why none of the existing Keen4-6 mods have custom music is because there's no music import utility?!  Wow, that would explain why most of them turn the music off by default - I thought the modders were just lazy [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopekeen.gif[/img] <font color="#EEF2EE">[url=http://www.shikadi.net/keenwiki/]KeenWiki[/url] | [url=http://www.shikadi.net/moddingwiki/]ModdingWiki[/url]</font>

title: well..
content:
From what I understand, it is possible to change the music in-game by using the WDC, which is a Wolfenstein 3d editor--but getting WDC to play nice with TED5 was a complicated task.

At least, the last time I tried to get changed music to combine with custom levels (albeit a while ago--at least 10 months) I had absolutely no success. Changing levels wasn't too hard, and changing music was somewhat understandable, with WDC... but for some reason I couldn't do both at once.

Though rumor has it that Zero X. Diamond is leaps and bounds ahead of us all, on this front... *suspense*

title: Re: well..
content:
Well technically it's not a hugely complicated task - all you'd need to do is extract all the files from the AUDIOT.CKx file, replace the extracted music and/or sound effect files however you please, then generate a new AUDIOT.CKx file. This will produce a new AUDIOHED.CKx and AUDIODCT.CKx, which you'll need to patch into the .exe file (no doubt by using CKPatch.)

As far as I'm aware Wolf3D uses the same format, so I'd be surprised if that editor didn't work.[url=http://www.shikadi.net/keenwiki/]KeenWiki[/url] | [url=http://www.shikadi.net/moddingwiki/]ModdingWiki[/url]

title: Re: well..
content:
